areas.title: AI-Powered Digital Twins
areas.text: I investigate digital twin architectures for sustainable urban transformation scenarios. The goal is to produce reliable computational support for analysis and decision workflows.

areas.title: Extended Reality and Adaptive Agents
areas.text: I study conversational and adaptive virtual agents in immersive environments. This work addresses interaction design and evaluation for robust XR systems.

areas.title: Digital Cultural Heritage Interfaces
areas.text: I contribute to systems for geolocating and exploring historical art commissions in Southern Italy. The technical focus is responsive data access for research and public-facing usage.
